ThingDef.label: herbalist table
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for the preparation of herbal medicine.

ThingDef.label: electric oven
ThingDef.Description: An oven

ThingDef.label: canning station
ThingDef.Description: A stove for canning foods.

ThingDef.label: Stone Mill
ThingDef.Description: A Stone Mill

ThingDef.label: hand sawmill
ThingDef.Description: A small muscle-powered hand saw for cutting logs into wood planks.

ThingDef.label: craftsman's table
ThingDef.Description: A work table equipped to cut rough stone into usable blocks and grind stone to sand.

ThingDef.label: smelting furnace
ThingDef.Description: A wood-fired furnace used for smelting steel into steel bars.

ThingDef.label: powered crafting table
ThingDef.Description: An electrically-powered table for quickly cutting logs and stone blocks, making sand, and for butchering mechanoids. Simple prosthetics can also be made here.

ThingDef.label: electric smelter
ThingDef.Description: An electric smelter that quickly turns metal ore ore and slag into bars. Consumes a lot of power.

ThingDef.label: Glassworks
ThingDef.Description: A table with tools for creating raw glass out of sand.

ThingDef.label: smithing table
ThingDef.Description: A table with tools for crafting, weapons, armor, and artillery shells.

ThingDef.label: tailor's loom
ThingDef.Description: A tailor's table used to spin raw materials into usable cloth.

ThingDef.label: tailor's workbench
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for clothing production.

ThingDef.label: sculptor's table
ThingDef.Description: A workbench equipped for artistic sculpting.

ThingDef.label: food prep table
ThingDef.Description: A heavy table used for butchering dead creatures into pieces of raw meat, and making simple salads.

ThingDef.label: simple grill
ThingDef.Description: A small grill used to cook meat into simple jerky.

ThingDef.label: cook stove
ThingDef.Description: A simple stove and attached countertop for preparing meals.

ThingDef.label: brewery
ThingDef.Description: A work station with all the equipment needed to brew beer, or make ethanol fuel from corn.

ThingDef.label: electrolyzer
ThingDef.Description: Electrolysis is the process where an electric current is passed through a liquid that conducts electricity. Used for creating refined metals.

ThingDef.label: chemlab
ThingDef.Description: A chemical laboratory with all the equipment needed to create medkits, and artificial bones.

ThingDef.label: organ vat
ThingDef.Description: A large vat used to turn human corpses into biomatter, and grow replacement organs.

ThingDef.label: composter
ThingDef.Description: A composter used to turn wood logs into mulch.

ThingDef.label: sun lamp
ThingDef.description: Lights an area brightly enough to grow crops.

ThingDef.label: Mark 1 Matter Replicator
ThingDef.Description: An advanced matter replication device.

ThingDef.label: hydroponics basin
ThingDef.description: For growing food. Hydroponics basins grow a few plants quickly. The basin requires power to work, and plants will die if power is cut.
